short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Notifies you to stop watching YouTube Shorts after a certain after scrolling a few.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you stay mindful of your YouTube Shorts usage by tracking how many Shorts you've watched consecutively. When you scroll past a set limit, a popup notification appears, encouraging awareness of your scrolling habits.
